text: Bloomfield is a township in Essex County, New Jersey, United States. As of the 2020 United States Census, the township's population was 53,105.QuickFacts for Bloomfield township, Essex County, New Jersey; Essex County, New Jersey; New Jersey from Population estimates, July 1, 2019, (V2019), United States Census Bureau. Accessed May 21, 2020. ==References== Category:Townships in New Jersey Category:Essex County, New Jersey
title: Bloomfield, New Jersey
